TopicTitle: Do you play any other games?

Articles.Content:
Hi guys.

Do you play any other games except ksp?

I play rust and battlefield 4. And I am currently looking for an MMO game I could play but pretty much all games I found are just copies of WOW. Any ideas what could I play?
Have you tried Planetside 2? It's not quite the same, but you might like it.

Pick up Space Engine. It lets you explore anywhere in the known and unknown universe. There is also an alpha mode where you can fly starships and lander shuttles.

Best of all, the Planetarium and alpha ships are free.
I'm one of those guys who plays competitive smash bros. I play a bit of league of legends too. But I've been playing more of KSP than anything for the past while.

Check out this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74198-Which-games-do-you-play

Yay! My thread is being advertised by someone!
I've been playing the Metal Gear Solid series.
I too have been hunting for a good MMORPG, at least, one that doesn't force you into a monthly fee.
i sometimes play mwo and mwll, and sometimes mw4. there is also the occasional starcraft2 game. and i will sometimes play some of the newer freespace mods. other than that i dont play many games.
